message.body: A friend sent this to me. http://www.goodfoodjobs.com/jobs/50216/field-manager.html
Ooo so tempting, it would be rlly bad of me to leave my job now bc my boss is about to retire, but this is very appealing to me.
I thought u would know more people than me who would be interested in this job.
Yeah I am selfish but I will put it out there
Somehow I don't quite believe you when you say that you are selfish.
I think I'd like that too
I just want all the cool jobs.... But at the end of the day I just want to work for myself.
I guess most people do, but I hope to actually make it happen
I'm betting you're going to achieve that goal.
Thanks for the extra confidence, I think so too.
